name: Nature's Fury (cheesemcpuff)
description:
This is my first attempt at a solo game that I created for University, it's an extremely simple turn based battle simulator vs AI. I doubt I will finish it but I may use certain aspects for future games. 

The art was done by my friend, her Instagram is @duzk.a for any business inquiries  

I would really appreciate some general feedback on things I should add, below is a list of user feedback:

- Attack Animations/SFX needed

- Death Animations/SFX needed

- Easier to understand UI

- Multiplayer

- Doesn't scale properly with full screen

- Active cooldown timer

- Wrong ability information sometimes

- Voltage doing damage to dead enemies

- Add skip button for dialogue along with back button when choosing moves

- Nerf Infernos damage

- Nerf Rafflesia
